original_title: President made wrong statement: Ven. Medagoda Abhayatissa Thera
original_body_lines: Venerable Prof. Medagoda Abhayatissa Thera criticized President Ranil Wickremesinghe on his recent statements regarding the Department of Archaeology.
The Thera said the President's criticisms diminish the work to protect Buddhist heritage through private funds.
Ven. Abhayatissa Thera made these comments following a meeting with the Chief Prelates of the Malwathu and Asgiri Chapters.
